'''Édouard J. Kloczko''' or '''Laurifindil''' ([[22 August|August 22]], [[1963]]), born in Lviv of Ukraine, is a linguist and translator.

He is well known in [[Tolkien fandom]], especially in [[France]], concerning his works about the [[languages]] of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. 

In [[1985]] he founded "la Fée" ("Faculté des études elfiques"), which means "[[Wikipedia:Fairy|fairy]]" in English; it was disbanded in [[1993]].
